channel.title: Customizable Skill Cape Template
channel.description:
This Skill Cape template allows you to Re-Colour It and Put a Symbol/Icon On it Using Metasequoia.
Included files: Class8_Skillcape_Template.txt Skillcape_Template_DaI.dat Skillcape_Template.dat
Download link:
[url=http://rapidshare.com/files/82740588/Yarnova_Skillcape_Template.rar.html]http://rapidshare.com/files/82740588/Yarnova_Skillcape_Template.rar.html[/url]
Credits To Yarnova For Files
To convert this to a .MQO file, Open it with DatMaker, Go to File then click Convert> MQO. You can find DatMaker In SilentCj's Big Modelling guide.

item.title: Customizable Skill Cape Template
item.dc:creator: @Diablo_Runes Diablo Runes

http://rapidshare.com/files/82740588/Yarnova_Skillcape_Template.rar | 3 KB

Currently a lot of users are downloading files. Please try again in 2 minutes or become a Premium member

Please note, the server is not going to check again within the next 2 minutes if downloading is possible again. To provide a fair platform, all user get the same options. Your last attempt was 59 seconds ago.[/code]

so could you upload to like uppit or mediafire please?

OT:Ive been looking for one of these for ages! thanks!
